creditline: Gift of Chichi Steiner and Tom Rassieur in honor of Peggy and Terry Rassieur
description: crucified Jesus on cross with two praying figures seated on crossbar of cross, flanking him; another praying figure with undifferentiated legs at bottom of cross; Jesus has sunburst-like halo; square decorative element with five punched designs at top of cross
title: Crucifix
